SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard

Class CaseBoard

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.Board
edu.rpi.legup.model.gameboard.CaseBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
PossibleNumberCaseBoard
public class CaseBoard extends Board
Represents a game board with specific rules for selecting puzzle elements. Extends the abstract `Board` class and adds functionality for handling pickable elements and case rules.
